SELECT u.id, u.username, u.PASSWORD, u.NAME, u.sex, u.pic_id, u.birth, u.email, u.state, u.expired, u.mobile, u.dept_id, u.gmt_create, u.gmt_modified, r.id rid, r.role_sign, m.id mid, m.perms FROM sys_user AS u LEFT JOIN sys_user_role AS ur ON ur.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN sys_role AS r ON r.id = ur.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu AS rm ON rm.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN sys_menu AS m ON m.id = rm.menu_id
